title: Yeah, We Loved 'A Star Is Born,' Too | The Watch (Ep. 296)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald get together to talk about their reactions to ‘A Star is Born,’ including Bradley Cooper’s skill as a director (3:36), how the movie portrayed the music industry (13:25), and how the movie treats addiction (24:49).
Read all of The Ringer's coverage of 'A Star is Born' here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
